hadiths.text: It was narrated that Zaid bin Aslam said:"Ibn 'Umar said: The Prophet (ﷺ) entered the Masjid of Quba' to pray there, then some men came in and greeted him with Salam. I asked Suhaib, who was with him: 'What did the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) do when he was greeted?' He said: 'He used to gesture with his hand

chapter.ara-name: باب رَدِّ السَّلاَمِ بِالإِشَارَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Returning the salams with a gesture when praying
